Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientNetwork

Class MessageHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientNetwork.MessageHandler
public class MessageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Class MessageHandler is a client class used to process messages received from the server.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private ClientView view  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MessageHandler​(ClientView view)
    Creates a new MessageHandler instance.

    private void applyChanges​(ChangeMessage m, boolean toPrint)
    Called when receiving a ChangesDone message.

    Finds a player's game board from a provided nickname.
    private boolean isLast​(java.util.List<ChangeMessage> elements, ChangeMessage a)
    Checks if a change message is the last in a list of ChangeMessage.
    void process​(Message message)
    Process messages received from the server, calling different methods on the and setting different ViewMessage that will be observed by CLI and GUI.

  • Field Details

    • view

      private final ClientView view

  • Constructor Details

    • MessageHandler

      public MessageHandler​(ClientView view)
      Creates a new MessageHandler instance.
      Parameters:
      view - the player's ClientView object

  • Method Details

    • process

      public void process​(Message message)
      Process messages received from the server, calling different methods on the and setting different ViewMessage that will be observed by CLI and GUI.
      Parameters:
      message - the message received from the server

    • findBoardByOwner

      private GameBoardInfo findBoardByOwner​(java.lang.String owner)
      Finds a player's game board from a provided nickname. If no game board is found a new one is created and added to the lists of game boards.
      Parameters:
      owner - the nickname of the player who owns the game board
      Returns:
      the found game board

    • isLast

      private boolean isLast​(java.util.List<ChangeMessage> elements, ChangeMessage a)
      Checks if a change message is the last in a list of ChangeMessage.
      Parameters:
      elements - the list of ChangeMessage objects
      a - the change message
      Returns:
      true if the message is the last in the list, false otherwise

    • applyChanges

      private void applyChanges​(ChangeMessage m, boolean toPrint)
      Called when receiving a ChangesDone message. It takes a change message as input and updates the player's ClientView object with the information contained in the message.
      Parameters:
      m - the ChangeMessage object
      toPrint - true if the updated elements needs to be showed to the player, false otherwise
